strategy_reasoning: A carousel format allows us to break down the technical density of 13 PRs into digestible, cozy 'vibes'. Using the retro gaming aesthetic makes the 'Level Up' metaphor for software updates feel nostalgic and warm rather than corporate. The music/audio updates are the hero feature, so they lead the visual narrative.
visual_style: Cozy 8-bit pixel art, Studio Ghibli meets retro gaming, warm lighting, chunky sprites, lime green accents.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art close-up of the cute 8-bit Pollinations bee mascot wearing large retro headphones. The bee is bobbing its head to music. Background is a soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient. Floating pixel musical notes and hearts around the bee. Warm, nostalgic lighting like Stardew Valley. Text in chunky pixel font at the bottom: 'AUDIO UPDATE'. Emotionally warm and playful.
images.description: Introduces the audio-heavy update with our mascot vibing to music.

images.prompt: A pixel art scene of a magical digital garden where musical instruments (guitars, synths) are growing out of the ground like flowers. A tiny pixel character is conducting the plants. Soft pastel colors, mint and peach. Prominent lime green (#ecf874) sparkles. Lo-fi aesthetic, clean lines, warm hug energy. Represents the new ElevenMusic and TTS v3 models. No text.
images.description: Visualizes the new music and speech capabilities as an organic, growing garden.

images.prompt: A cute pixel art 'renovation' scene. Tiny pixel sprites are painting a retro UI window frame with fresh lime green (#ecf874) paint. The window shows a clean, organized inventory slot system. Cozy interior setting with a potted plant. Represents the frontend redesign and smoother login. Warm lighting, isometric view like Unpacking game.
images.description: Metaphor for the frontend redesign and authorization improvements.

images.prompt: A friendly pixel art robot character named 'Polly' waving hello, standing next to a pixelated discord logo style chat box. The robot is holding a flower. Background is a warm cream with soft lime green (#ecf874) accents. The vibe is helpful and welcoming. Represents the new Polly Discord bot. Cozy 8-bit aesthetic.
images.description: Introduces the new Polly Discord bot as a helpful friend.
